marquee.span: The Columbia "Community" Safe Room will be unavailable for the foreseeable future due to repairs. In the event we have a tornado warning for our area, patrons in the Columbia Elementary school zone will be able to seek shelter at the West Central Elementary Safe Room located at 1001 W. 7th St. Joplin, MO. Thank you for your patience!
